sub_title: Certified Gut Health Specialist and Functional Nutrition  | Wellness Community Manager  | Travel Coordinator | Sales Representative
summary:
As a Health Coach, Customer Service Agent, Project Developer, community manger and Sales Representative, I have gained valuable skills in communication, organization, problem-solving, and public relations. My experience as a Health and Wellness community manager and coach has allowed me to develop a deep understanding of human behavior and the factors that motivate people to make positive choices in their lives and work. As a Customer Service Agent, I have learned how to empathize with customers, resolve their issues, and provide exceptional service. And as a Project Developer, I have become skilled at managing timelines, budgets, and resources to ensure successful project completion.

My previous work experience allowed me to develop excellent public relations skills throughout Central America and North America. I was in constant communication with travel agencies, immigration services, hotel chains and more which helped me to establish strong relationships with key stakeholders. I am passionate about creating positive experiences for people, whether it is through helping them achieve their goals, delivering exceptional customer service, or building strong relationships with partners and stakeholders. I am excited to continue using my skills to make a positive impact in the world and create communities that thrive in a healthy environment.

profile_positions.description:
I am a Health and Wellness Community Builder and Manager. With a deep passion for health and wellness, my career has been focused on creating wellness-oriented digital nomad experiences that foster productivity, creativity, and well-being.
Today, I work with businesses that offer co-living and co-working spaces for digital nomads. I specialize in developing programs and a wide variety of activities that promote healthy and sustainable travel and well-being including, fun hikes and extreme activities around nature, healthy cooking classes and educational workshops, wellness counseling, group fitness and yoga sessions, and to spice it up and keep it fun, dance and music venues. 

I am committed to creating a community-oriented approach that fosters productivity, creativity, and well-being. My goal is to bring a unique perspective and approach to community building and management, which I believe can make a significant impact on your business. I help coordinate accommodations, transportation and manage logistics for the communities. 

I believe that a wellness-oriented community manager can bring significant benefits to a digital nomad business, including improved productivity, increased creativity, and better overall well-being for the nomads. I am excited about the opportunity to discuss how I can support your business goals and values with my expertise.
profile_positions.title: Health And Wellness Community Manager

profile_positions.description: Generated sales for 30+ premium memberships, while successfully promoting a variety of events such as cacao ceremonies, tours, fire ceremonies, and 1:1 holistic therapy sessions. Developed multimedia content and maintained effective communication with clients through various social media channels to foster positive customer interactions. Facilitated tours across Guatemala and fostered sustainable digital nomad communities through the integration of holistic therapies offered by the Mayan Wisdom Project
profile_positions.title: Community Manager and Sales Representative

profile_positions.description: Assisted content creators and delivered accurate and creative ideas for health and wellness projects. I Facilitated educational Health and Nutrition workshops on the well being of our microbiome, mental health and plant-based nutrition.
profile_positions.title: Workshop Facilitator and Creative Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Sold and enrolled over 50+ students during my time working at Up Front Canada
and used social advertising to level up sales. Managed emails and online calls to sell
educational programs to countries in Latin America. Maintained positive business relationships to ensure future sales and built successful partnerships and alliances with socially responsible travel agencies and immigration consultants, contributing to a 70% increase in client base. Referred over 50+ students
and earned commissions per reference that successfully used their services for visa
applications and booked flights.
profile_positions.title: Sales Representative in Latin America and Educational Counselor

profile_positions.description:
With my extensive knowledge of Health and Nutrition and my passion for plant-based
gastronomy, I developed day to day project coordination, resourcing, and execution of
multiple tasks to leverage De Groene Chef's food concept idea. Designed over 20+
high quality recipes to which all of them where successful creations that attracted over
500+ new costumers during a two month activation period and by co-creating and
collaborating with creative makers, we promoted each others
creations and conceptualized ideas for potential events, to leverage each creative
concepts revenue.
profile_positions.title: Project Developer and Creative Assistant
